mapper.sql: id, code, name, province_id, city_id, county_id, detail_address, status, remark, createTime, updateTime, createUser, updateUser
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_company
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_company (id, code, name, province_id, city_id, county_id, detail_address, status, remark, createTime, updateTime, createUser, updateUser) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{countyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_company
id,
code,
name,
province_id,
city_id,
county_id,
detail_address,
status,
remark,
createTime,
updateTime,
createUser,
updateUser,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{countyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=BIT},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_company
mapper.update:
update t_company
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_id = #{record.provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
city_id = #{record.cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
county_id = #{record.countyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
detail_address = #{record.detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=BIT},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createUser = #{record.createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateUser = #{record.updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_company set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, code = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{record.provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city_id = #{record.cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, county_id = #{record.countyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, detail_address = #{record.detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=BIT}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createUser = #{record.createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateUser = #{record.updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_company
code = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_id = #{record.provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
city_id = #{record.cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
county_id = #{record.countyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
detail_address = #{record.detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=BIT},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createUser = #{record.createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateUser = #{record.updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_company set code = #{record.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{record.provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city_id = #{record.cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, county_id = #{record.countyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, detail_address = #{record.detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=BIT}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createUser = #{record.createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateUser = #{record.updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_company
order by ${orderByClause}
select r.id as companyid,r.name as companyName from t_company r where r.status = 1 order by r.id

select * from v_root_in a where 1=1
and a.companyid=#{record.id}

select * from v_sex a where 1=1
and a.companyid=#{record.id}

select * from v_user_status a where 1=1
and a.companyid=#{record.id}

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y%m') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y%m%d') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y%m%d') datetime,
tsu.nickname, tc.`name` as companyname, count(tcs.id) totalOrder, sum(if(tcs.`status`=1,1,0)) secuessOrder, sum(if(tcs.`status`=99 and DATE_FORMAT(tcs.subscribe_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <=#{endtime} and DATE_FORMAT(tcs.subscribe_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >=#{starttime},1,0)) wastageOrder, sum(if(tcs.`status`=0,1,0)) unfinishedOrder, sum(if(tcs.subscribe_date <=#{endtime} and tcs.subscribe_date >=#{starttime},1,0)) actual_subscribe_enable_arrive, sum(if(tcs.subscribe_date <=#{endtime} and tcs.subscribe_date >=#{starttime} and tcs.`status`=1,1,0)) actual_jiezhen, (SELECT count(tcs1.id) all_totalOrder from t_customer_subscribe tcs1 where DATE_FORMAT(tcs1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')<=#{endtime} and DATE_FORMAT(tcs1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >=#{starttime}) all_totalOrder FROM t_customer_subscribe tcs LEFT JOIN t_sys_user tsu ON tcs.create_user = tsu.username INNER JOIN t_company tc ON tcs.company_id = tc.id LEFT JOIN v_root_in vri on tcs.root_in = vri.`value` and vri.companyid = tcs.company_id LEFT JOIN v_sex vs on tcs.sex=vs.`value` and vs.companyid = tcs.company_id LEFT JOIN v_subscribe vss on tcs.`status` = vss.`value` and vss.companyid= tcs.company_id where 1 = 1
and DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{starttime}
and DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endtime}
and tcs.company_id = #{companyid}
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y'),tsu.nickname,tcs.company_id
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y%m'),tsu.nickname,tcs.company_id
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y%m%d'),tsu.nickname,tcs.company_id
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(tcs.create_time, '%Y%m%d'),tsu.nickname,tcs.company_id
ORDER BY datetime desc,totalOrder desc

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y%m') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y%m') datetime,
tc.`name` as companyName, ti.`name` productName, ti.inventory currentInventoryNumbs, ti.units, ti.inventory*ti.price currentInventoryMonery, sum(if(til.option_type=4,ifnull(til.numbs,0),0))* ti.price addInventoryMonery, sum(if(til.option_type=5,ifnull(til.numbs,0),0))* ti.price removeInventoryMonery, sum(if(til.option_type=6,ifnull(til.numbs,0),0))* ti.price useInventoryMonery, sum(if(til.option_type=7,ifnull(til.numbs,0),0))* ti.price backInventoryMonery, sum(if(til.option_type=4,ifnull(til.numbs,0),0)) addNumbs, sum(if(til.option_type=5,ifnull(til.numbs,0),0)) removeNumbs, sum(if(til.option_type=6,ifnull(til.numbs,0),0)) orderUseNumbs, sum(if(til.option_type=7,ifnull(til.numbs,0),0)) orderBackNumbs FROM t_inventory ti LEFT JOIN t_inventory_log til ON ti.id = til.product_id INNER JOIN t_company tc on ti.companyid=tc.id where 1 = 1 and til.product_id is not null
and DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y%m') = concat(#{year},#{month})
and DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y') = #{year}
and ti.companyid = #{companyid}
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y'),ti.id,ti.companyid
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y%m'),ti.id,ti.companyid
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y%m'),ti.id,ti.companyid
ORDER BY datetime desc,currentInventoryNumbs desc,companyName

select count(*) from( SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y%m') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y%m') datetime,
tc.`name` as companyName, ti.`name` productName, ti.inventory currentInventoryNumbs, ti.units, ti.inventory*ti.price currentInventoryMonery, sum(if(til.option_type=4,ifnull(til.numbs,0),0))* ti.price addInventoryMonery, sum(if(til.option_type=5,ifnull(til.numbs,0),0))* ti.price removeInventoryMonery, sum(if(til.option_type=6,ifnull(til.numbs,0),0))* ti.price useInventoryMonery, sum(if(til.option_type=7,ifnull(til.numbs,0),0))* ti.price backInventoryMonery, sum(if(til.option_type=4,ifnull(til.numbs,0),0)) addNumbs, sum(if(til.option_type=5,ifnull(til.numbs,0),0)) removeNumbs, sum(if(til.option_type=6,ifnull(til.numbs,0),0)) orderUseNumbs, sum(if(til.option_type=7,ifnull(til.numbs,0),0)) orderBackNumbs FROM t_inventory ti LEFT JOIN t_inventory_log til ON ti.id = til.product_id INNER JOIN t_company tc on ti.companyid=tc.id where 1 = 1 and til.product_id is not null
and DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y%m') = concat(#{year},#{month})
and DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y') = #{year}
and ti.companyid = #{companyid}
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y'),ti.id,ti.companyid
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y%m'),ti.id,ti.companyid
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y%m'),ti.id,ti.companyid
) temp

select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum,btemp.* from ( SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y%m') datetime,
tc.`name` as companyName, ti.`name` as name, sum(if(til.option_type=6 or til.option_type=5 ,ifnull(til.numbs,0),0))* ti.price value from t_inventory ti LEFT JOIN t_inventory_log til ON ti.id = til.product_id INNER JOIN t_company tc on ti.companyid=tc.id where 1=1
and DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y%m') = concat(#{year},#{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y') = #{year}
and ti.companyid = #{companyid}
GROUP BY ti.id,ti.companyid,DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y')
GROUP BY ti.id,ti.companyid,DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y%m')
ORDER BY value desc LIMIT 10 ) btemp,(select @rownum:=0) t
UNION
SELECT 11 as rownum,temp1.datetime,temp1.companyName,'其他' as productName,sum(temp1.value) value from ( SELECT @rownum1:=@rownum1+1 as rownum1,temp.* from ( SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y%m') datetime,
tc.`name` as companyName, ti.`name` as name, sum(if(til.option_type=6 or til.option_type=5 ,ifnull(til.numbs,0),0))* ti.price value from t_inventory ti LEFT JOIN t_inventory_log til ON ti.id = til.product_id INNER JOIN t_company tc on ti.companyid=tc.id where 1=1
and DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y%m') = concat(#{year},#{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
and DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y') = #{year}
and ti.companyid = #{companyid}
GROUP BY ti.id,ti.companyid,DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y')
GROUP BY ti.id,ti.companyid,DATE_FORMAT(til.create_time, '%Y%m')
ORDER BY value desc ) temp,(select @rownum1:=0) t ) temp1 where temp1.rownum1>10 GROUP BY temp1.datetime desc,temp1.companyName ORDER BY rownum

SELECT p.id,p.`code`,p.`name`,p.remark,p.`status`,p.province_id as provinceId,p.city_id as cityId,p.county_id as countyId,p.createTime,p.createUser,p.updateTime,p.updateUser, CONCAT(tp.`name`,tc.`name`,tcy.`name`,ifnull(p.detail_address,'')) as address,p.detail_address as detailAddress FROM `t_company` p LEFT JOIN t_province tp ON p.province_id = tp.id LEFT JOIN t_city tc ON p.city_id = tc.id LEFT JOIN t_county tcy ON p.county_id = tcy.id where 1=1
and p.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and p.status=#{status}
order by p.updateTime desc

SELECT temp.datetime,temp.companyName,temp.rootInName,temp.professionName,sum(temp.numbs) numbs,convert(sum(temp.total_amount),decimal) total_amount,convert(avg(temp.total_amount_avg),decimal) total_amount_avg from ( SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(b.createTime, '%Y') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(b.createTime, '%Y%m') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(b.createTime, '%Y%m%d') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(b.createTime, '%Y%m%d') datetime,
a.`name` as rootInName, tc.name as companyName, count(DISTINCT b.phonenumb) numbs, sum(ifnull(c.total_amount,0)) total_amount, avg(ifnull(c.total_amount,0)) total_amount_avg, vcp.text as professionName FROM v_root_in a LEFT JOIN t_ltn_customer b ON a.`value` = b.root_in AND a.companyid = b.company_id and b.status=1 LEFT JOIN t_customer_consumpton_amount c on b.id=c.customer_id LEFT JOIN v_customer_profession vcp on b.profession = vcp.`value` INNER JOIN t_company tc ON a.companyid = tc.id and tc.`status`=1 INNER JOIN t_customer_porject tcp on b.id = tcp.order_id and tcp.update_time is null and DATE_FORMAT(b.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(tcp.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') where 1=1
and DATE_FORMAT(b.createTime, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{starttime}
and DATE_FORMAT(b.createTime, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endtime}
and a.companyid = #{companyid}
GROUP BY companyname,DATE_FORMAT(b.createTime, '%Y'),a.name,vcp.text
GROUP BY companyname,DATE_FORMAT(b.createTime, '%Y%m'),a.name,vcp.text
GROUP BY companyname,DATE_FORMAT(b.createTime, '%Y%m%d'),a.name,vcp.text
GROUP BY companyname,DATE_FORMAT(b.createTime, '%Y%m%d'),a.name,vcp.text
UNION all SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(tcpl.create_time,'%Y') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(tcpl.create_time,'%Y%m') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(tcpl.create_time,'%Y%m%d') datetime,
DATE_FORMAT(tcpl.create_time,'%Y%m%d') datetime,
vri.name as rootInName, tc.name as companyName, count(tcpl.id) numbs,0 as total_amount, 0 as total_amount_avg, vcp.text as professionName from t_ltn_customer a INNER JOIN t_customer_porject tcp on a.id = tcp.order_id and DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime,'%Y-%m-%d')< DATE_FORMAT(tcp.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d') INNER JOIN t_customer_project_log tcpl on tcp.id=tcpl.cp_id LEFT JOIN v_customer_profession vcp on a.profession = vcp.`value` INNER JOIN t_company tc ON a.company_id = tc.id and tc.`status`=1 LEFT JOIN v_root_in vri on a.root_in = vri.`value` and a.company_id=vri.companyid where a.`status`=1
and DATE_FORMAT(tcpl.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{starttime}
and DATE_FORMAT(tcpl.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{endtime}
and a.company_id=#{companyid}
GROUP BY a.company_id,datetime desc,vri.`name`,vcp.text ORDER BY companyName,datetime desc,rootInName,professionName ) temp GROUP BY temp.companyName,temp.rootInName,temp.datetime,temp.professionName order by datetime

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime, '%Y%m') datetime, sum(b.total_amount)/10000 total_amount, count(DISTINCT a.phonenumb) newnumbs FROM t_ltn_customer a LEFT JOIN (select sum(b.total_amount)total_amount,b.customer_id as id from t_customer_consumpton_amount b GROUP BY b.customer_id) b on a.id = b.id where a.status=1
and DATE_FORMAT(a.createTime, '%Y-%m') >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL 5 MONTH), '%Y-%m')
and a.createTime <= NOW()
and a.company_id = #{companyid}
GROUP BY datetime ORDER BY datetime asc
